081ff324-ae71-4409-8319-aa4d9de66ef2.name: wav file path
081ff324-ae71-4409-8319-aa4d9de66ef2.description:
Receives the path to the file containing the speech sample in WAV (PCM) format.

e.g.: "/Users/user1/AzureSpeech/samples/speech.wav"

a05bf83f-4203-45b9-b234-06810d3d5636.name: params

1c280501-3bf4-4171-bdbf-c8c109ba7f42.type: {"TranscriptEvent": {"Transcript": {"Results": {"Alternatives": {"Items": {"Confidence": number, "Content": string, "EndTime": number, "StartTime": number, "Type": string, "VocabularyFilterMatch": boolean}[], "Transcript": string}[], "ChannelId": string, "EndTime": number, "IsPartial": boolean, "ResultId": string, "StartTime": number, "test": string}[]}}}
1c280501-3bf4-4171-bdbf-c8c109ba7f42.name: result
1c280501-3bf4-4171-bdbf-c8c109ba7f42.description:
Sends a results of the recognition. Contains a set of transcription results from one or more audio segments, along with additional information per your request parameters. This can include information relating to alternative transcriptions, channel identification, partial result stabilization, language identification, and other transcription-related data.
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/transcribe/latest/APIReference/API_streaming_Result.html

b2c84b80-0ad5-487b-b521-995033f25274.type: {"TranscriptEvent": {"Transcript": {"Results": {"Alternatives": {"Items": {"Confidence": number, "Content": string, "EndTime": number, "StartTime": number, "Type": string, "VocabularyFilterMatch": boolean}[], "Transcript": string}[], "ChannelId": string, "EndTime": number, "IsPartial": boolean, "ResultId": string, "StartTime": number}[]}}}
b2c84b80-0ad5-487b-b521-995033f25274.name: current
b2c84b80-0ad5-487b-b521-995033f25274.description: Sends the result of each chunk of the audio, as soon as part of the recognition is ready. Contains a set of transcription results from one or more audio segments, along with additional information per your request parameters. This can include information relating to alternative transcriptions, channel identification, partial result stabilization, language identification, and other transcription-related data.

84d3e051-2427-4897-98d7-c50fa39397fd.name: error
84d3e051-2427-4897-98d7-c50fa39397fd.description: Sends any error that might have occurred during the API call.

name: sdks/aws/Speech recognizer (from WAV file input)
description: Extracts text from speech recording supplied as a WAV file on the local filesystem.
